items.title: Tax Saving Hacks for Early Retirement with Examples
items.headline: Strategy for Early Retirement with minimal Tax Liability
objectives_summary: Students will learn all tax-advantaged accounts such as pre-tax 401k, after tax 401k, Roth 401k, Roth IRA, HSA.
The course will walk students step by step and explain what tax saving strategy works best for each situation
It will also teach students how to legally avoid tax at all (contributing and withdrawing)

items.title: Multi-State Employee Tax Withholding

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course discusses the handling of state taxes when an employee lives in 1 state and works in another.
objectives_summary: Explore the various taxes required by different states including income tax, disability insurance and the plethora of local taxes that may apply to wages paid.
Discover how to determine state withholding liability.
Recognize the difference between a resident and a nonresident of a state and how that affects state income tax withholding.

items.title: Education Tax Credits & Education Tax Benefits
items.headline: American Opportunity Tax Credit, Lifetime Learning Tax Credit, Student Loan Interest Deduction, (ESA), (QTP)
objectives_summary: List Education Tax Credits and Education Tax Benefits
Describe the American Opportunity Tax Credit
Explain the Amount of Tax Benefit for the American Opportunity Tax Credit

items.title: IRS Practices & Procedures
items.headline: Learn your responsibilities when dealing with the IRS.
objectives_summary: Students will learn IRS procedures around identity theft and become familiar with IRS preparer penalties. In addition, Individual Taxpayer Identification Numbers (ITINs) are covered in the course along with due diligence procedures for tax preparers. The student will also learn electronic filing practices and the requirements to qualify as a participant in the Annual Filing Season Program (AFSP).

items.title: Mauritius, a good country for South Africans to live & work
items.headline: We take a look at all the important points of emigrating to Mauritius from South Africa (or any other country).
objectives_summary: The ins and outs of emigrating to Mauritius from South Africa
How do you obtain residency in Mauritius
A look at taxation - overall, individual taxation and company tax

items.title: Corporate Tax Filing: Schedule M-3: Additional Reporting

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course covers unusual and nonrecurring disclosure requirements for Income (Loss) and expense/deduction items.
objectives_summary: Identify which unusual/nonrecurring book-tax differences must be disclosed on Schedule M-3.
Discover why it is important to “get the numbers right” and to separately and adequately disclose income and expense/deductions.
Recognize how to disclose the following Part II, income items.

items.title: Corporate Tax Filing: Schedule M-3: Reporting Requirements

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course covers the Schedule M-3 filing and reporting requirements for a consolidated group.
objectives_summary: Identify which entities from the financial consolidated group are included/excluded on the consolidated tax return.
Discover the Schedule M-3, Part I reporting requirements for a consolidated group on the consolidated return.
Identify how to report the current/deferred US tax expense for a consolidated group on Lines 1 and 2 of Schedule M-3, part III.

items.title: How To Complete IRS Form W-9 & W-8 Withholding Certificates
items.headline: Review the various rules and circumstances which determine what type of withholding certificate you must complete
objectives_summary: Learn how to complete IRS Form W-9 for various types of U.S. entities
Learn how to Complete IRS Form W-8BEN, W-8BEN-E, and W-8IMY
We will review many real world examples of how to complete each certificate given a set of facts and circumstances

items.title: Corporate Tax Filing: Schedule M-3: Part II

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course covers the Schedule M-3, Part II filing and reporting requirements.
objectives_summary: Recognize which entities are required to file Schedule M-3.
Identify the basic financial information disclosure requirements.
Identify how to reconcile worldwide consolidated net income, line 4 to net income of includible.

items.title: Tax Minimization Strategies When Computing Corporate Tax Exp

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course covers the computation of corporate taxable expense.
objectives_summary: Explore the compliance issues relating to the filing of a corporate tax return, including the requirement to reconcile financial and taxable income on Schedule M-1
Explore how to compute corporate estimated tax payments
Recognize the importance of the Effective Tax Rate versus the Statutory Tax Rate and what strategies can be employed to reduce the effective tax rate below the statutory tax rate

items.headline: Wanted to Save more on PERSONAL TAXES from 2019 onwards under New Tax Reform?  Get TaxStrategy for fraction of the cost.
objectives_summary: How to make decision to go for standard deduction or itemized deduction in a given year
Key steps to be taken and tax planning tips for saving tens, hundreds or even thousands of dollars in taxes
